abstract: Drawing an average of 18.8 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., ABC’s “Dancing With the Stars” delivered Monday’s largest audience.
snippet: Drawing an average of 18.8 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., ABC’s “Dancing With the Stars” delivered Monday’s largest audience.
lead_paragraph: Drawing an average of 18.8 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., ABC’s “Dancing With the Stars” delivered Monday’s largest audience, lifting the network to No. 1 in the night’s ratings, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
